me.pusty.gdx.desktop

Class ResourceFormater

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.pusty.gdx.desktop.ResourceFormater

  • public class ResourceFormater
extends java.lang.Object
    Formats resources into a json file to load them internally on all platforms (Desktop, Browser, Android, IOS)

                                           java.lang.String prefix,
                                           java.lang.String suffix,
                                           java.util.List<java.io.File> list)
        Returns a List which contains all files within a given directory and all files within directories within the directory
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory to start searching from
        prefix - the file prefixes to search for (null or empty to ignore)
        suffix - the file suffixes to search for (null or empty to ignore)
        list - the list to add to (null if searching just began)
        Returns:
        a list with all files
